description:
Lightweight performance – from the valleys to the summits: Their Westalpen 3L light alpine touring jacket for men has been developed for demanding mountaineers who are looking for the perfect symbiosis of lightness, protection and functionality. The new jacket and pants in the 3L Westalpen light outfit can be packed up small and are very versatile.

A Dermizax® NX 3-layer construction protects against extreme weather while the technical design focuses completely upon the needs of alpinists in the high mountains. Thanks to the extra-high-performance Dermizax® NX membrane, the outer material is completely wind and waterproof without compromising on breathability or freedom of movement.

The high-performance fit of the Westalpen 3L light  alpine touring jacket for men will sit ideally no matter what movement you make in ice, snow or on mixed terrain. With additional features such as extra-large front pockets, a high collar and a helmet-compatible, two-way adjustable hood with horizontal and vertical adjustment options, this lightweight 3L hardshell will provide alpinists with everything they need. Mesh lining in the front pockets improves air circulation. 120 Merino Tec inserts ensure the jacket is comfortable in the neck and chin area.
name: Ortovox Westalpen 3L Light Jacket - Mens
